title: Resveratrol as an add on therapy to sertraline in animal models of depression.
abstract: Sertraline, a selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor, is a leading antidepressant. Resveratrol is a natural polyphenol with diverse biological activities, including antidepressant-like effects. In this study we evaluated the individual and combined antidepressant effects of resveratrol and sertraline alongwith effect of resveratrol on sertraline serum levels.
